function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Governments failing to prepare for the magnitude of the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased spread of the virus, overwhelming healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Develop emergency response plans, allocate resources for testing and healthcare infrastructure","Technologies":"Telehealth, AI for predictive modeling, contact tracing apps","People":"Government officials, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Unprecedented demand for critical resources","Impact":"Shortage of essential supplies, strain on healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Increase production capacity, stockpile resources, establish supply chain management systems","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, inventory tracking systems","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, suppliers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Need for innovative and emerging technologies to combat the pandemic","Impact":"Ineffective response to the pandemic, slow vaccine development","Mitigation":"Invest in research and development, adopt advanced technologies for vaccine development and population screening","Technologies":"Molecular technologies, supercomputing, 5G infrastructure, telehealth solutions","People":"Healthcare workers, researchers, government agencies","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, research institutions"}]}
